block.p: Manhattan
CHINATOWN

$538,000 185 Park Row (Pearl Street) (Chatham Green) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; windowed kitchen, south and east exposures; balcony; storage and laundry facilities in building; maintenance $581, 46% tax deductible; listed at $557,500, 6 weeks on market (broker: Weichert/Mazzeo Agency)

GREENWICH VILLAGE $2.7 million 2 Fifth Avenue (Eighth Street) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining area, study, 3 walk-in closets, steam shower, 2 exposures; balcony; health club in building; maintenance $1,930, 50% tax deductible; listed at $2.9 million, 26 weeks on market (brokers: Eychner Associates; Prudential Douglas Elliman)
FINANCIAL DISTRICT

$690,000 3 Hanover Square (William Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen; entry foyer, kitchen with marble countertops, 5 oversize windows, 14-ft. ceilings, bamboo floors, south and east exposures; laundry facilities in building; maintenance $1,088, 52% tax deductible; listed at $695,000, 16 weeks on market (broker: Citi Habitats New York)

EAST MIDTOWN $315,000 153 East 57th Street (Gotham Towne House) 400-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; renovated kitchen and bath; maintenance $829, 50% tax deductible; listed at $340,000, 24 weeks on market (broker: Manhattan Apartments)
UPPER EAST SIDE

$860,000 250 East 65th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 950-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; common charge $763; taxes $3,600; listed at $875,000, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Brown Harris Stevens)
Bronx

RIVERDALE $685,000 5639 Delafield Avenue 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,400-sq.-ft. town house in a 4-year-old building; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen and baths, den, finished basement, central air-conditioning, hardwood floors; 1-car garage; 25-by-75-ft. lot; taxes $5,000; listed at $685,000, 21 weeks on market (broker: John Edwards Real Estate)
Brooklyn

PARK SLOPE $1,242,500 375 12th Street 2-family, prewar town house; 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room, renovated kitchen and baths, whirlpool tub in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; hardwood floors, original molding and detail in each; rear garden; 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,147; listed at $1.25 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Aguayo & Huebener)
Queens
KEW GARDENS HILLS

$725,000 141-51 73rd Terrace 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 62-year-old detached wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, living room, family room, hardwood floors, full basement; 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,199; listed at $850,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: Weichert/FH Realty)

REGO PARK $385,000 63-22 98th Place (Halsey House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances, renovated baths, hardwood floors, whirlpool, 3 exposures; maintenance $951, 50% tax deductible; listed at $388,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Benjamin)
Long Island

$540,000 30 South Oaks Boulevard 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 49-year-old aluminum- and brick-sided split-level-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, playroom, hardwood floors, central air-conditioning; 2-car garage; 70-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $12,431; listed at $559,000, 10 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Benjamin)
